## hpr0424 :: TiT Radio Episode 006

 Hello and welcome to TiT Radio 006!
  On tonights show... monsterb, Peter64, Klaatu, jlindsay,
Azimuth, Xoke, and 330 talk about tircd,  Blood Frontier, 
Concordance,  Pro Git Book,  
Xephyr,  KDE 4.3,  Little Brother by Cory Doctorow, 
Tiny Tiny RSS,  ROX-Filer,  ROX-Desktop,  and so much
more.  Please visit https://titradio.info for full shownotes. 
apt-get moo.
